line.comment: * If $posArray is a sector, a random position in that sector will be found.
* If $homebase is specified, the ship will be spawned there, otherwise to $posArray in sector $posArray[3].
* $homebase cannot be a ship.
* Avoid docking more ships than $homebase can handle.
* Here is where most ships are built. These come with a default set of equipment, such as a duplex scanner
* Mordan8 - pre-determine at creation time if this ship will bail when attacked. Only applicable for M6 and larger.

line.text: 'Критическая ошибка в Mayhem.BuildShip. Сообщите, пожалуйста, следующие данные: '

line.comment: * Mordan2, if this is an attack vessel and not a transport, default the turrets to attack all enemies.
* Zero Hour 2.0 will always get here. Hector sets the global variable above regardless of the 9972 file setting. See Mayhem.Setup.Variables. - Mordan.
* Zero Hour 1.10
* Mordan2
* if M1 or M2, install good scanner and docking computer. * Note, TM's and M8's automatically come with Triplex scanners.
* if TM, install a Transporter Device. Useful for fleet supplier role. Note, Carriers automatically come with Transporter devices and Carrier Repair Modules (see TShips)
* A few TM's come with them.. seems random. So we're adding one just to be sure.
* end Mordan2
* Mordan7
* Change Default Missile Fire Probability from 5% to 75%
* Zero Hour 2.0 - AI also gets free lasers and shields
* We add missiles and CCDS in Mayhem.Task.TemplateWhenReady -> Mayhem.EquipShip.Missiles.
* Mordan2. Only add the Triplex for huge ships.
* Add-Ons 1.3: black market ships do not spawn with internal defenses.
* Doubled chances of capital ships getting defenses on insane. Normally 12.5% chance to get firewall and 33.3% chance to get ISL.
* Add-Ons 1.4: On insane difficulty, 50% of freighters have firewall software. This reduces the number of hackable TS/TP that the player can get.
* Unlocks the trade report menu.
* Default job names.
* Add-Ons 1.4.10: Set local variable to preserve tuning if ship is copied over.

sval.val: Критическая ошибка в Mayhem.BuildShip. Сообщите, пожалуйста, следующие данные:
и
Тюнинг Пандоры
sector or station in [3]
can be null
can be null (range: 0-6)
If $posArray is a sector, a random position in that sector will be found.
If $homebase is specified, the ship will be spawned there, otherwise to $posArray in sector $posArray[3].
$homebase cannot be a ship.
Avoid docking more ships than $homebase can handle.
Here is where most ships are built. These come with a default set of equipment, such as a duplex scanner
Mordan8 - pre-determine at creation time if this ship will bail when attacked. Only applicable for M6 and larger.
Mordan2, if this is an attack vessel and not a transport, default the turrets to attack all enemies.
Zero Hour 2.0 will always get here. Hector sets the global variable above regardless of the 9972 file setting. See Mayhem.Setup.Variables. - Mordan.
Zero Hour 1.10
if M1 or M2, install good scanner and docking computer. * Note, TM's and M8's automatically come with Triplex scanners.
if TM, install a Transporter Device. Useful for fleet supplier role. Note, Carriers automatically come with Transporter devices and Carrier Repair Modules (see TShips)
A few TM's come with them.. seems random. So we're adding one just to be sure.
end Mordan2
Change Default Missile Fire Probability from 5% to 75%
Zero Hour 2.0 - AI also gets free lasers and shields
We add missiles and CCDS in Mayhem.Task.TemplateWhenReady -> Mayhem.EquipShip.Missiles.
Mordan2. Only add the Triplex for huge ships.
Add-Ons 1.3: black market ships do not spawn with internal defenses.
Doubled chances of capital ships getting defenses on insane. Normally 12.5% chance to get firewall and 33.3% chance to get ISL.
Add-Ons 1.4: On insane difficulty, 50% of freighters have firewall software. This reduces the number of hackable TS/TP that the player can get.
Unlocks the trade report menu.
Default job names.
Add-Ons 1.4.10: Set local variable to preserve tuning if ship is copied over.
